name: Tiny Been
description:
This is my Ludum Dare 38 entry. My first game and, therefore, my first Ludum Dare game! It's a very simple game, but I think it helped me gain more experience in game development.

Controls

  • A/Left Arrow: Change direction of the planet and player to left.
  • D/RightArrow: Change direction of the planet and player to right.
  • Space/Ctrl: Shoot.

Plataforms

You can play on your browser or download for Windows.
